title: BRIEF-Assa Abloy Acquires Placard In Australia
text:
BRIEF-Assa Abloy Acquires Placard In Australia

Stock Markets 29 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 16:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Assa Abloy Acquires Placard In Australia Sept 30 (Reuters) - Assa Abloy AB : * ASSA ABLOY ACQUIRES PLACARD IN AUSTRALIA * ASSA ABLOY HAS ACQUIRED PLACARD, AUSTRALIA'S LARGEST SECURE CARD MANUFACTURER * ACQUISITION WILL BE ACCRETIVE TO EPS FROM START * PLACARD SALES FOR 2019 ARE EXPECTED TO REACH ABOUT AUD 63 MILLION (APPROX. SEK 520 MILLION) WITH A GOOD EBIT MARGIN AND ACQUISITION WILL BE ACCRETIVE TO EPS FROM START

BRIEF-Assa Abloy Acquires Placard In Australia
description: BRIEF-Assa Abloy Acquires Placard In Australia
